flicker.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to burn or shine with an unsteady light that goes on and off quickly
flicker.translation[0].definitions[1].de: if an emotion or expression flickers on someone’s face or through their mind, it exists or is shown for only a short time
flicker.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: A puzzled smile flickered across the woman’s face.
flicker.translation[0].definitions[2].de: to quickly make a sudden small movement or series of movements
flicker.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: Polly’s eyelids flickered, then she slept.
flicker.translation[1].definitions[0].de: an unsteady light that goes on and off quickly
flicker.translation[1].definitions[1].de: a quick sudden movement or series of movements
